availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Jefferson Rogers (Alleged murderer and criminal in Jefferson County, Kentucky)

body.p: Louisville, Kentucky, resident. Resident of Jefferson County, Kentucky, in 1861. Accused of the murders of Jesse Hill, William Hill, and Russell Hill, in Jefferson County in 1861. Convicted by the Jefferson County Circuit Court of assaulting Casper Kromer in Jefferson County in May 1862.

ab.bibl:
"The Midnight Assassination," Courier-Journal (Louisville, KY), January 04, 1861, p. 1.
"Killed His Brother and Killed In Turn," Courier-Journal (Louisville, KY), May 23, 1885, p. 4.
KYR-0001-020-2119.
